caption.title: Retraction dynamics and expansion of the species' distribution area of Ceratophrys stolzmanni, according to the niche modeling method.
caption.p: Last interglacial (A); Last glacial maximum (B) and Current (C). (A): 746 km 2; (B): 4,729 km 2 and (C): 595 km 2. Distribution areas indicated in the northern part of the continent are unlikely and represent analysis artifacts resulting from Grinnellian niche concept. Training data: AUC = 1.000 (A); AUC = 0.999 (B) and AUC = 1.000 (C). Test data: AUC = 1.000 (A); AUC = 0.987 (B) and AUC = 0.996 (C).
Click here for additional data file.
